summary: This is a Bank of America account statement for a joint account held by Leon D. Black and Debra Black, with Melanie Spinella listed as having power of attorney. The statement shows significant financial activity in January 2011, including deposits of over $20 million and withdrawals of over $23 million, leaving an ending balance of approximately $848,411.77.

events.title: Bank Account Activity
events.description: Significant financial transactions occurred in a Bank of America account held by Leon D. Black and Debra Black, including deposits of $20,724,721.06 and withdrawals of $23,171,592.73.

keyFacts: Leon D. Black and Debra Black held a joint Bank of America account (number ending 3840) with multi-million dollar transactions.
Melanie Spinella was authorized with power of attorney over the account.
In January 2011, the account had deposits exceeding $20.7 million and withdrawals exceeding $23.1 million.
The account's ending balance on January 31, 2011, was $848,411.77.
The document is a financial record showing the scale of financial activity associated with Leon D. Black.
